summary: The study demonstrates the application of EnzymeML in characterizing enzymatic reactions, specifically using Michaelis-Menten kinetics for Fe-S cluster biogenesis and acetohydroxyacid synthase activity.
key_claims: EnzymeML was used to model kinetic parameters for Fe-S cluster production by IscS and IscU.
Michaelis-Menten models were fitted using both interferENZY webtool and Jupyter Notebook.
